name: The 108
description: This gin based cocktail from Emily Smith of Clock Bar in San Francisco marries cardamom and garam masala for a warming winter drink.

recipeInstructions.text: To Make Masala Syrup: Place water in a small sauc pan over medium heat. Once warm, add maple syrup and garam masala. Stir until blended. Let cool.
To Make Cardamom Infused Gin: Place gin and and cardamom in a large glass jar. Let rest for 5 days. Strain before use.
To Make Cocktail: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Old Raj Gin, masala syrup, cardamom infused gin, and Lillet. Shake well and strain into a coupe glass.
